entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning then changing to rain at times heavy late this morning. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then to 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy with showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
